law.catch_line: Fee to delist hazardous waste -- Fee to exempt a hazardous constituent or establish an alternate concentration limit.

text.section: A petition to delist hazardous waste shall be subject to and accompanied by payment to the cabinet of a two thousand five hundred dollar ($2,500) fee for each hazardous waste petitioned.

An applicant seeking to exempt a hazardous constituent or to establish an alternate concentration limit in a hazardous waste treatment, storage, or disposal facility permit shall be subject to a fee by the cabinet equal to the cost of review, after receiving the cabinet's determination that the exemption or alternative will be granted.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 471, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.
